gantrytips.tip: Use the layout slider to select the desired column distribution (width) used for the Top Position. The active value will be highlighted in blue and underlined. The Force Positions attribute causes all the Top positions to be displayed. If there is no module published in a position, then a blank space is left. The position count controls the number of forced positions.
